resources.string: Welcome to Help the Homeless App
This app requires background location permission, please go to settings and choose the \"allow all the times\" option
"Please go to the location permissions settings and choose \"allow all the times\" "
Location services must be enabled to use the app
Geofence service is not available now. Go to Settings>Location>Mode and choose High accuracy.
Your app has registered too many geofences.
You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call.
Please grant background permissions to save geofence
You need to grant location permission in order to select the location.

Help the Homeless is an app that informs users about the homeless living around their current location in case they feel charitable and want to make someoneâ€™s day. It is yet another tool in our fight against poverty. The app will rely on users to enter the information of the homeless in their area, or even better, if the homeless individual has a smartphone they can join themself. With this information other app users will know about the homeless person and either help them financially or even better hire them based on their education and work experience. The App will serve as the LinkedIn for the homeless.

The purpose of this app is to make it easier for homeless individuals to be helped or find work. If you decide to use this app, you are acknowledging that hth is not responsible for any misuse of this app. All parties, whether helpers or those in need of housing, are fully responsible and will be held accountable for any unlawful use of the services this app offers.
If you are a helper, please obtain the homeless individual\'s permission before creating a profile for them.
